Review Name: Mind-blowing purchase Review Description: I think it is the best product in this price range. It cools my 180 square feet room in 5 minutes. It's absolutely noiseless. The beautiful design has impressed me. It was delivered in time and the installation was done within three days. I had to pay Rs. 3000 for installation. Voltas is a reliable brand and this particular Split AC is the best in the market. Go for it!
